Class ReadAFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReadAFile

  • public class ReadAFile
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReadAFile class takes a file path and will read the file and return the requested information.
    Since:
    2016-10-01
    Version:
    v1.0.0
    Author:
    Stephen McFarlane

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadAFile()
      ReadAFile default constructor sets the private variables to the default state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String pullRoleFromCredentials()
      pullRoleFromCredentials is used to return the system information from the role file.
      java.lang.String readUsersFromFile()
      readUserFromFile uses the user name and filePath to read the MD5Password out of the text file to check against the password the user entered.
      void setFilePath(java.lang.String filePath)
      setFilePath sets the private variable for use in the class.

      setUsername sets the private variable for use in the class.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadAFile

        public ReadAFile()
        ReadAFile default constructor sets the private variables to the default state.

        Sets the private variables to empty strings.

        • fileMD5Password - This is the variable that will hold the value from the file.
        • role - This the user role from the credentials text file.
        • systemInfo - This is the information to return for the user
        • filePath - This is the path to the file that will be read.
        • username - This is the user name to validate the password for.

    • Method Detail

      • setFilePath

        public void setFilePath(java.lang.String filePath)
        setFilePath sets the private variable for use in the class.
        Parameters:
        filePath - This is the path to the file that will be read.

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        setUsername sets the private variable for use in the class.
        Parameters:
        username - This is the user name to validate the password for.

      • readUsersFromFile

        public java.lang.String readUsersFromFile()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        readUserFromFile uses the user name and filePath to read the MD5Password out of the text file to check against the password the user entered.
        Returns:
        The MD5 password hash from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - Gives an exception if the file does not exists.

      • pullRoleFromCredentials

        public java.lang.String pullRoleFromCredentials()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        pullRoleFromCredentials is used to return the system information from the role file. This is only called once a user and password have been validated. Based on the role the user is assigned it will pull the correct file for the system information.

        uses the user name to find the role and then the role name to pull the correct file. This then calls pullRoleSystemInformation passing it the path to the role file.

        Returns:
        returns either the system information or and empty string if the user name or role do not match to a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case the file does not exist
